name: mcp_runtime
description: Execution and lifecycle management layer for MCP servers - connects to mcp_index for discovery, dynamically starts/stops servers, routes tool calls via ZeroMQ. Single semantic_router metatool with progressive disclosure pattern.

features.description: Core RuntimeEngine with server lifecycle management
MCP server exposure via FastMCP (search, manage, execute tools)
Background task execution with priority queue
Content manager for large response offloading
API field mapping alignment with mcp_index OpenAPI spec
npm stdout silencing for clean stdio transport
Single semantic_router metatool pattern (12 operations in one unified interface)
Early validation for background tasks (check server running before queuing)
cancel_task operation to abort queued/running background tasks
list_tasks operation to see all pending/running background tasks

quality_notes: Semantic search quality excellent - multilingual (FR/EN), typo-tolerant, synonym-aware. Progressive disclosure reduces token usage by ~90% on discovery operations.
